elements.title: Tsunoshima Bridge (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that to preserve the surrounding natural environment, Tsunoshima Bridge (pictured) curves to avoid an island?

elements.title: Patricia Grace (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that New Zealand author Patricia Grace did not include a glossary for Māori terms in her book Potiki because she "didn't want the Māori language to be treated as a foreign language in its own country"?

elements.title: Korakou culture (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the Greek Korakou culture had two-storey buildings with internal stairs more than 4,000 years ago?

elements.title: Keith Foulger (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that part of Keith Foulger's job was to make sure the front and back ends of Britain's first nuclear submarine fitted together?

elements.title: Agatha All Along (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the WandaVision song "Agatha All Along" was inspired by the theme songs of The Munsters and The Addams Family?

elements.title: his tea-planter grandfather (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that seventy years after the death of his tea-planter grandfather, publisher Neville Armstrong remembered his piercing blue eyes and large white spade beard?

elements.title: DynaMo (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the BBC programme DynaMo was created after a survey revealed parents did not want to help children with homework?

elements.title: Norm Michael (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Norm Michael did not know he was an NFL Draft selection until 55 years later?

elements.title: 调校骁龙888+还得看荣耀 Magic 3 Pro试玩《原神》最高画质 (快科技)
elements.contents:
目前中国有超过6亿手游玩家，玩手游已经成为日常，如今手游画质越来越高，对手机性能也提出了越来越高的要求。
有些手游重度爱好者，甚至买手机只看游戏性能，对于此类小伙伴，选择高通骁龙888

elements.title: 男子倒车转360度连撞5车！全身发抖湿了一身：从此不再开车 (快科技)
elements.contents:

elements.title: 女鞋第一股跌下神坛！惊天转型 (快科技)
elements.contents:

elements.title: 河南一家11人确诊新冠 邻居竟也被感染：原因无奈 (快科技)
elements.contents: 8月16日晚，河南省商丘市网信办公布12例新冠肺炎确诊病例的活动轨迹。其中，10人为尹某某的亲属，2人为邻居。尹某为8月13日商丘市确诊的一名产妇，当日5时，商丘市第一人民医院在给患者开展核酸

elements.title: 在轨60天！太空出差三人组刷新驻留时长纪录 (快科技)
elements.contents:
据中国载人航天微信公众号消息，今天，执行神舟十二号飞行任务的3名航天员聂海胜、刘伯明和汤洪波已在轨工作和生活了60天。

elements.title: 东京奥运会拿下中国首金美女学霸上热搜：我在清华是学渣 (快科技)
elements.contents:

elements.title: 码农属于新生代农民工上热搜  网友：官宣了 没毛病 (快科技)
elements.contents:
以往，很多程序员调侃自己为“码农”。而昨天人社部的一份报告，则等于“官宣”了——码农属于新生代农民工。随后，相关话题迅速登上微博热搜。

elements.title: 吃货当心了！广东8箱进口榴莲阳性 已流向市场 (快科技)
elements.contents:
对于吃货们来说，进口榴莲要当心了。
据极目新闻报道称，广东省江门市蓬江区荷塘镇有8箱进口榴莲在抽检中被测出核酸检测阳性，且已流向市场。荷塘镇政府表示，确有其事，目前已对榴莲去向进行追

elements.title: 吴亦凡被批捕后 都美竹做法绝了 (快科技)
elements.contents:
日前，@平安北京朝阳 官方发布消息表示：2021年8月16日，北京市朝阳区人民检察院经依法审查，对犯罪嫌疑人吴某犯，以涉嫌强奸罪批准逮捕。
